abstract: Citigroup said Monday it would consolidate its global credit-card business into a single unit and revamp its consumer-banking business along geographical lines. The announcement prompted some observers to speculate about a potential sale or public offering.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup said Monday it would consolidate its global credit-card business into a single unit and revamp its consumer-banking business along geographical lines. The announcement prompted some observers to speculate about a potential sale or public offering.

headline.main: Citi to Form Credit Card Unit
